TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A large vein that empties into the heart. It carries blood from the legs and feet and from organs in the abdomen and pelvis.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "inferior vena cava"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "vena cava inferior"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Vena grande que desemboca en el corazón. Transporta la sangre de las piernas y los pies, y de los órganos del abdomen y la pelvis.
